quote: Happiness does not depend on what you have or who you are. It solely relies on what you think.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Thousands of candles can be lit from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: The root of suffering is attachment.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Happiness is not having a lot. Happiness is giving a lot.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Happiness will never come to those who fail to appreciate what they already have.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Health is the greatest gift, contentment is the greatest wealth, faithfulness is the best relationship.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Let us rise up and be thankful, for if we didn’t learn a lot today, at least we learned a little, and if we didn’t learn a little, at least we didn’t get sick, and if we got sick, at least we didn’t die; so, let us all be thankful.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Happiness does not depend on external circumstances; it is governed by our mental attitude.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: The secret of happiness is not in doing what one likes, but in liking what one does.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: True Love is born from understanding.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: The trouble is, you think you have time.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: To keep the body in good health is a duty… otherwise, we shall not be able to keep our minds strong and clear.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Your work is to discover your world and then with all your heart give yourself to it.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: You yourself must strive. The Buddhas only point the way.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: You can search throughout the entire universe for someone who is more deserving of your love and affection than you are yourself, and that person is not to be found anywhere. You, yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: With our thoughts, we make the world.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: In the end, these things matter most: How well did you love? How fully did you live? How deeply did you let go?
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: You cannot travel the path until you have become the path itself.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: To understand everything is to forgive everything.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Work out your own salvation. Do not depend on others.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Believe nothing, no matter where you read it.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: No one saves us but ourselves.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Holding onto anger is like drinking poison and expecting the other person to die.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Three things cannot be long hidden: the sun, the moon, and the truth.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Holding on to anger is like grasping a hot coal with the intent of throwing it at someone else; you are the one who gets burned.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: It is better to conquer yourself than to win a thousand battles. Then the victory is yours. It cannot be taken from you, not by angels or by demons, heaven or hell.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: You will not be punished for your anger, you will be punished by your anger.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: It is a man's own mind, not his enemy or foe, that lures him to evil ways.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: It is better to travel well than to arrive.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Just as a candle cannot burn without fire, men cannot live without a spiritual life.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Whatever words we utter should be chosen with care for people will hear them and be influenced by them for good or ill.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: What we think, we become.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: We are what we think. All that we are arises with our thoughts. With our thoughts, we make the world.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Just as treasures are uncovered from the earth, so virtue appears from good deeds, and wisdom appears from a pure and peaceful mind. To walk safely through the maze of human life, one needs the light of wisdom and the guidance of virtue.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: A jug fills drop by drop.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Work out your own salvation. Do not depend on others.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Better than a thousand hollow words, is one word that brings peace.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: The only real failure in life is not to be true to the best one knows.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: He who walks in the eightfold noble path with unswerving determination is sure to reach Nirvana.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: A woman of the world is anxious to exhibit her form and shape, whether walking, standing, sitting, or sleeping. Even when represented as a picture, she desires to captivate with the charms of her beauty and, thus, to rob men of their steadfast heart.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: In a controversy the instant we feel anger we have already ceased striving for the truth, and have begun striving for ourselves.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: To live a pure unselfish life, one must count nothing as one's own in the midst of abundance.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: I do not believe in a fate that falls on men however they act; but I do believe in a fate that falls on them unless they act.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Let my skin and sinews and bones dry up, together with all the flesh and blood of my body! I welcome it! But I will not move from this spot until I have attained the supreme and final wisdom.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: He who loves 50 people has 50 woes; he who loves no one has no woes.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: I am not the first Buddha who came upon Earth, nor shall I be the last. In due time, another Buddha will arise in the world - a Holy One, a supremely enlightened One, endowed with wisdom in conduct, auspicious, knowing the universe, an incomparable leader of men, a master of angels and mortals.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Of those beings who live in ignorance, shut up and confined, as it were, in an egg, I have first broken the eggshell of ignorance and alone in the universe obtained the most exalted, universal Buddhahood.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: All wrong-doing arises because of mind. If mind is transformed can wrong-doing remain?
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: When one has the feeling of dislike for evil, when one feels tranquil, one finds pleasure in listening to good teachings; when one has these feelings and appreciates them, one is free of fear.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Charity bestowed upon those who are worthy of it is like good seed sown on a good soil that yields an abundance of fruits. But alms given to those who are yet under the tyrannical yoke of the passions are like seed deposited in a bad soil. The passions of the receiver of the alms choke, as it were, the growth of merits.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: We are shaped by our thoughts; we become what we think. When the mind is pure, joy follows like a shadow that never leaves.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Hatred does not cease by hatred, but only by love; this is the eternal rule.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: You can search throughout the entire universe for someone who is more deserving of your love and affection than you are yourself, and that person is not to be found anywhere. You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe deserve your love and affection.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: To keep the body in good health is a duty... otherwise we shall not be able to keep our mind strong and clear.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: There are only two mistakes one can make along the road to truth; not going all the way, and not starting.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Do not overrate what you have received, nor envy others. He who envies others does not obtain peace of mind.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Even death is not to be feared by one who has lived wisely.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: To enjoy good health, to bring true happiness to one's family, to bring peace to all, one must first discipline and control one's own mind. If a man can control his mind he can find the way to Enlightenment, and all wisdom and virtue will naturally come to him.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Unity can only be manifested by the Binary. Unity itself and the idea of Unity are already two.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Those who are free of resentful thoughts surely find peace.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Chaos is inherent in all compounded things. Strive on with diligence.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: He who gives away shall have real gain. He who subdues himself shall be free; he shall cease to be a slave of passions. The righteous man casts off evil, and by rooting out lust, bitterness, and illusion do we reach Nirvana.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: I never see what has been done; I only see what remains to be done.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Better than worshiping gods is obedience to the laws of righteousness.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: I was born into the world as the king of truth for the salvation of the world.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: The foot feels the foot when it feels the ground.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: To be idle is a short road to death and to be diligent is a way of life; foolish people are idle, wise people are diligent.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Without health life is not life; it is only a state of langour and suffering - an image of death.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: With fools, there is no companionship. Rather than to live with men who are selfish, vain, quarrelsome, and obstinate, let a man walk alone.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: However many holy words you read, however many you speak, what good will they do you if you do not act on upon them?
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: What is the appropriate behavior for a man or a woman in the midst of this world, where each person is clinging to his piece of debris? What's the proper salutation between people as they pass each other in this flood?
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Virtue is persecuted more by the wicked than it is loved by the good.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: The wise ones fashioned speech with their thought, sifting it as grain is sifted through a sieve.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: The virtues, like the Muses, are always seen in groups. A good principle was never found solitary in any breast.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: The foolish man conceives the idea of 'self.' The wise man sees there is no ground on which to build the idea of 'self;' thus, he has a right conception of the world and well concludes that all compounds amassed by sorrow will be dissolved again, but the truth will remain.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Jab kabhi dharma ki haani hoti hai aur jeevan ka maqsad bhula diya jaata hai, tab main dharti par prakat hota hoon. Main har yug mein janm leta hoon achchai ko bachane, burai ko nasht karne aur dharma ko fir se sthapit karne ke liye.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Arjuna, jo mujhe jis tarah se prapt hota hai, main use usi tarah se sweekar karta hoon. Sabhi raaste mujhe tak pahunchte hain.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Main hi srishti ka aarambh, madhya aur ant hoon.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Pashuon mein main sher hoon; pakshiyon mein, main Garuda hoon. Daityon mein, main Prahlada hoon, aur mapne waalon mein main samay hoon.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Main mrityu hoon, jo sab kuch jeet leti hai, aur main un sabhi jeevon ka srot hoon jo abhi janm lene wale hain.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Bas yaad rakho ki main hoon, aur main apne astitva ke ek chhote se ansh se pure brahmand ko sambhalta hoon.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Arjuna, mere andar hazaron divya roop dekho, anant vibhinn rangon aur aakaaron ke saath. Prakriti ke devon ko dekho, aur bahut se aise chamatkar jo pehle kabhi nahi dikhaye gaye. Pure brahmand ko mere andar ghoomte hue dekho, aur wo sab kuch jo tum dekhna chahte ho.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Main samay hoon, sab kuch nasht karne wala; main duniya ko khaane aaya hoon.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Wo mujhe priya hai jo sukh ke peeche nahi bhaagta aur dukh se door nahi bhagta, jo shok nahi karta, lalch nahi karta, balki cheezon ko aane aur jaane deta hai jaise wo hoti hain.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Jaise ek talab ka koi fayda nahi jab pura desh pani se bhar gaya ho, usi tarah se shastron ka koi fayda nahi us gyani aadmi ya aurat ke liye, jo Bhagwan ko har jagah dekhta hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Wahi sach mein dekhte hain jo har jeev mein Bhagwan ko ek samaan dekhte hain, jo marne wale sabhi ke dilon mein amar ko dekhte hain. Har jagah ek hi Bhagwan ko dekhkar, wo khud ko ya doosron ko nuksaan nahi pahunchate. Is tarah wo param lakshya prapt karte hain.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Meri shakti ki ek boond se main dharti mein pravesh karta hoon aur sabhi jeevon ko sambhalta hoon. Chandrama ke madhyam se, jeevan dene wale drav ka patr, main sabhi paudhon ko poshan deta hoon. Main saans lene wale jeevon mein pravesh karta hoon aur jeevan dene wali saans ke roop mein rehta hoon. Main pet mein wo aag hoon jo sabhi bhojan ko pachati hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Is aatma-nashak narak ke teen dwar hain: kaam, krodh aur lobh. In teenon ka tyaag karo.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Indriyon se milne wala sukh shuruwat mein amrit ki tarah lagta hai, lekin ant mein zeher ki tarah kadwa hota hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Wo jo shuruwat mein zeher ki tarah lagta hai, lekin ant mein amrit ki tarah swad deta hai - ye sattva ka anand hai, jo apne aap se shant dimag se paida hota hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Bhagwan sabhi jeevon ke dilon mein rehte hain aur unhe maya ke chakkar mein ghumate hain. Apni puri shakti se uski sharan mein jao, aur uski kripa se tumhe gambhir shanti milegi.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Jo kuch bhi tum karo, use mujhe arpan karo - wo bhojan jo tum khate ho, wo balidaan jo tum karte ho, wo madad jo tum dete ho, yahan tak ki tumhara dukh bhi.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Main garmi hoon; main baarish deta aur rokta hoon. Main amaratva hoon aur main mrityu bhi hoon; main wo hoon jo hai aur wo bhi jo nahi hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Jo log shraddha aur bhakti se doosre devon ki pooja karte hain, wo bhi meri hi pooja karte hain, Arjuna, bhale hi wo aam tarike se na karein. Main sabhi pooja ka uddeshya hoon, uska aanand lene wala aur Swami hoon.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Jo log mujhe mrityu ke samay yaad karte hain, wo mujhe prapt hote hain. Ismein koi sandeh nahi hai. Mrityu ke samay jo bhi man mein hota hai, wo marne wale ki manzil tay karta hai; hamesha unki pravritti us sthiti ki taraf hogi.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Jab dhyan mein maharat haasil ho jaati hai, to man ek hawa-rahit jagah mein deepak ki lau ki tarah atal hota hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Wo hamesha ke liye azaad hain jo sabhi swarthi ichhaon ka tyaag karte hain aur 'main', 'mujhe' aur 'mera' ke ahankar se mukt ho kar Bhagwan mein mil jaate hain. Yahi param sthiti hai. Ise prapt karo, aur mrityu se amaratva ki taraf badho.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Wo buddhi mein jeete hain jo khud ko sab mein aur sab ko khud mein dekhte hain, jinhone har swarthi ichha aur dil ko tadpane wali indriyon ki lalasa ka tyaag kar diya hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Karma ka arth niyat mein hai. Niyat hi mahatvapoorn hai. Jo log sirf kaam ke fal ki ichha se prerit hote hain, wo dukhi hote hain, kyunki wo apne kiye hue kaamon ke parinamon ke baare mein hamesha chintit rehte hain.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Tumhe kaam karne ka adhikar hai, lekin kabhi bhi kaam ke fal ka nahi. Tumhe kabhi bhi inaam ke liye kaam mein nahi lagna chahiye, aur na hi nishkriyata ki aasha karni chahiye.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Is duniya mein kaam karo, Arjuna, ek aadmi ki tarah jo apne andar sthapit hai - swarthi lagavon ke bina, aur safalta aur viphalta mein ek samaan. Kyunki yoga man ki purn samanta hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Samay ki shuruwat mein maine shuddh hriday ke liye do raaste ghoshit kiye: jnana yoga, adhyatmik buddhi ka vicharatmak marg, aur karma yoga, nishkaam seva ka sakriy marg. Yeh yoga ke buniyadi vibhinn prakar hain.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Apna kaam hamesha doosron ke kalyan ko dhyaan mein rakhkar karo. Aise hi kaam se Janaka ne siddhata prapt ki; doosron ne bhi is marg ka anusaran kiya hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Teenon lokon mein mere liye kuch bhi prapt karne ko nahi hai, Arjuna, aur na hi aisa kuch hai jo mere paas nahi hai; main kaam karta rehta hoon, lekin main apni kisi zaroorat se prerit nahi hoon.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Agyani apne laabh ke liye kaam karte hain, Arjuna; gyani duniya ke kalyan ke liye kaam karte hain, apne baare mein soche bina.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Doosre ke dharma mein safal hone se behtar hai ki apne dharma mein sangharsh karein. Apne dharma ka palan karne mein kuch bhi nahi khota, lekin doosre ke dharma mein pratiyogita bhay aur asuraksha paida karti hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Indriyan shareer se unchi hain, man indriyon se uncha hai; man se upar buddhi hai, aur buddhi se upar Atma hai. Is tarah, us param ko jaankar, Atma ko ahankar par raj karne do. Apne mazboot haathon ka istemal swarthi ichha ke bhayanak dushman ko maarne ke liye karo.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Tum aur main kai janmon se gujre hain, Arjuna. Tum bhool gaye ho, lekin mujhe wo sab yaad hain.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Mera sachcha astitva ajanma aur aparivartansheel hai. Main wo Swami hoon jo har jeev mein rehta hai. Apni maya ki shakti se, main apne aap ko ek seemit roop mein prakat karta hoon.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Jo mujhe apne divya Swaroop ke roop mein jaante hain, wo is vishwas ko tod dete hain ki wo shareer hain aur alag jeevon ke roop mein punarjanm nahi lete hain. Aisa aadmi, Arjuna, mujhse ek ho jaata hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Swarthi lagav, bhay aur krodh se mukt, mujhse bhare hue, khud ko mujhe samarpit karte hue, mere astitva ki aag mein shuddh hue, kai log mujhme ekta ki sthiti tak pahunche hain.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Karma mujhse nahi chipakte kyunki main unke parinamon se juda hua nahi hoon. Jo log ise samajhte hain aur iska abhyas karte hain, wo azaadi mein jeete hain.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Gyani dekhte hain ki nishkriyata ke beech mein karya hai aur karya ke beech mein nishkriyata hai. Unki chetna ekjut hai, aur har karya puri jaagrookta ke saath kiya jaata hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Arpan karne ki prakriya Brahman hai; jo arpan kiya jaata hai wo Brahman hai. Brahman Brahman ki aag mein balidaan arpan karta hai. Brahman un logon dwara prapt kiya jaata hai jo har karya mein Brahman ko dekhte hain.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Buddhi ka arpan kisi bhi bhautik arpan se behtar hai, Arjuna; kyunki sabhi karya ka lakshya adhyatmik buddhi hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Un logon tak pahuncho jinhone jeevan ka lakshya mahsus kar liya hai aur unse shraddha aur bhakti ke saath sawal karo; wo tumhe is buddhi mein nirdesh denge.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Yahan tak ki agar tum sabse bade paapi bhi ho, Arjuna, tum adhyatmik buddhi ki madad se sabhi paapon se paar ho sakte ho.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Krishna Arjuna ko Gita sunate hain.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Jaise aag ki garmi lakdi ko rakh mein badal deti hai, usi tarah gyan ki aag sabhi karmon ko rakh mein badal deti hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Jo log sabhi swarthi lagavon ko Brahman ko samarpit karte hain, wo kamal ke patte ki tarah hote hain jo pani mein saaf aur sukha tairta hai. Paap unhe sparsh nahi kar sakta.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Jo log apne sabhi kaamon mein lagav ka tyaag karte hain, wo 'nau dwaron ke shahar', shareer mein, apne Malik ke roop mein santusht rehte hain. Unhe karya karne ke liye prerit nahi kiya jaata hai, aur na hi wo doosron ko karya mein shaamil karte hain.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Jin logon ke paas yah buddhi hai, wo sabhi ke prati samaan aadar rakhate hain. Wo aadhyatmik apekshak aur bahishkrit mein, ek haathi, ek gau aur ek kutte mein ek hi Aatma ko dekhte hain.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Indriyon ki duniya mein kalpito sukhon ki ek shuruaat aur ek ant hota hai aur duhkh ko janm dete hain, Arjuna. Gyani unmein khushi nahi khojte. Lekin jo log kaam aur krodh ke veg ko jeet lete hain jo shareer mein utpann hote hain, wo purn hote hain aur aanand mein jeete hain. Wo apna aanand, apna aaraam aur apna prakash puri tarah se khud mein paate hain. Swami ke saath ek, wo Brahman mein nirvana prapt karte hain.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Krodh aur swarthi ichha se mukt, man mein ekjut, jo log yoga ke marg ka anusaran karte hain aur Aatma ko mahsus karte hain, wo hamesha ke liye us param sthiti mein sthapit ho jaate hain.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Mujhe sabhi jeevon ke dost ke roop mein jaankar, brahmand ke Swami, sabhi arpano aur sabhi aadhyatmik anushasanon ke ant, wo shaashwat shanti prapt karte hain.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Wo nahi jinmein urja ki kami hai ya karya karne se door rehte hain, balki wo jo bina inaam ki aasha ke kaam karte hain, wo dhyan ka lakshya prapt karte hain.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Jo log apne karya ke parinamon se lagav ka tyaag nahi kar sakte hain, wo marg se bahut door hain.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Apni ichha ki shakti se khud ko punah aakar do; kabhi bhi khud ko swa-ichha se apmaanit na hone do. Ichha hi Aatma ka ekmatra dost hai, aur ichha hi Aatma ka ekmatra dushman hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Jinhone khud par vijay prapt kar lee hai, unke liye ichha ek dost hai. Lekin ye un logon ka dushman hai jinhone apne andar Aatma ko nahi paaya hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Param Vastavikta un logon ki chetna mein prakat hoti hai jinhone khud par vijay prapt kar lee hai. Wo shanti mein jeete hain, thand aur garmi, sukh aur dukh, prashansa aur ninda mein ek samaan.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Sabhi bhayon ko Aatma ki shanti mein ghulkar aur sabhi kaamon ko Brahman ko samarpit karke, man ko niyantrit karke aur use mujh par sthir karke, mujhe apna ekmatra lakshya banaakar dhyan mein baitho.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Arjuna, jo log bahut adhik khaate hain ya bahut kam khaate hain, jo bahut adhik sote hain ya bahut kam sote hain, wo dhyan mein safal nahi honge. Lekin jo log khaane aur sone, kaam aur manoranjan mein sanyami hain, wo dhyan ke madhyam se dukh ke ant tak pahunchenge.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Shant man mein, dhyan ki gahrai mein, Aatma khud ko prakat karta hai. Aatma ke madhyam se Aatma ko dekhkar, ek apekshak purn paripurti ke aanand aur shanti ko jaanata hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Jahan kahin bhi man bhatakta hai, bechain aur vyapak roop se bina bahar santushti ki talash mein, use andar le jao; use Aatma mein aaraam karne ke liye prashikshit karo.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Main un logon ke liye hamesha maujood hoon jinhone mujhe har jeev mein mahsus kiya hai. Sabhi jeevan ko mere prakat hone ke roop mein dekhkar, wo mujhse kabhi alag nahi hote hain.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Jab koi vyakti doosron ke sukhon aur dukhoon ko aise javab deta hai jaise ki wo uske apne hon, to usne aadhyatmik sangam ki sabse unchi sthiti prapt kar lee hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Jo koi bhi achchha kaam karta hai, wo kabhi bhi bure ant tak nahi pahunchega, chahe wo yahan ho ya aane wali duniya mein.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Kai jeevan bhar ke nirantar prayason ke madhyam se, ek vyakti sabhi swarthi ichhaon se shuddh ho jaata hai aur jeevan ka param lakshya prapt karta hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Dhyan kathin tapasya aur gyan ke marg se shreshth hai. Yah nishkaam seva se bhi shreshth hai. Tum dhyan ka lakshya prapt karo, Arjuna!.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Yahan tak ki jo log dhyan karte hain, unmein bhi wo purush ya mahila jo mujhmein purn shraddha ke saath pooja karta hai, mujhmein puri tarah se lin, yoga mein sabse majbooti se sthapit hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Apne man ko mujh par kendrit karke, Arjuna, yoga ke abhyas se khud ko anushasit karo. Mujh par puri tarah se nirbhar raho. Suno, aur main tumhare sabhi sandehon ko door kar doonga; tum mujhe puri tarah se janoge aur mujhse ek ho jaoge.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Brahmand ka janm aur vilay khud mujhmein hota hai. Aisa kuch bhi nahi hai jo mujhse alag astitva mein hai, Arjuna. Pura brahmand mujhse mere aabhushanon ke haar ki tarah latka hua hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Arjuna, main shuddh pani ka swad aur suraj aur chandrama ki chamak hoon. Main pavitr shabd aur hawa mein suni jaane wali dhwani hoon, aur manushyon ka saahas hoon. Main dharti mein meethi sugandh aur aag ki chamak hoon; main har jeev mein jeevan aur aadhyatmik apekshak ka prayatn hoon.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Mera shaashwat beej, Arjuna, har jeev mein paaya jaata hai. Main un logon mein bhedbhav karne ki shakti hoon jo buddhiman hain, aur un logon ka gaurav hoon jo shreshth hain. Jo log mazboot hain, unmein main shakti hoon, josh aur swarthi lagav se mukt. Main ichha khud hoon, agar wo ichha jeevan ke lakshya ke saath mel mein hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Sattva, rajas aur tamas ki sthitiyaan mujhse aati hain, lekin main unmein nahi hoon.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Yeh jo teen gun hain, sattva, rajas aur tamas, yeh meri divya maya se bane hain, jinko paar karna mushkil hai. Par jo mujh mein sharan lete hain, wo is maya se paar ho jaate hain.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Kuch log dukh ke kaaran aadhyatmik jeevan mein aate hain, kuch jeevan ko samajhne ke liye; kuch jeevan ka maqsad haasil karne ki chaah mein aate hain, aur kuch gyanwaan hote hain. Dridh bhakti se, hamesha mujhse jude hue, wo gyanwaan insaan sabse badhkar hain.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Kai janmon ke baad gyanwaan mujh mein sharan lete hain, mujhe har jagah aur har cheez mein dekhte hue. Aise mahaan log bahut kam hote hain.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Duniya, mohit hokar, yeh nahi jaanti ki main bina janm ka aur avinashi hoon. Main sab jaanta hoon ateet, vartmaan aur bhavishya ke baare mein, Arjuna; par koi bhi mujhe poori tarah nahi jaanta.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Moh utpann hota hai aakarshan aur vikarshan ke dwesh se, Arjuna; har praani janm se inhi se mohit hota hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Jo mujhe brahmand par shaasan karte hue dekhte hain, jo mujhe adhibhuta, adhidaiva aur adhiyajna mein dekhte hain, wo mrityu ke samay bhi mere prati chetan rahte hain.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Bhagwan param kavi hain, pratham kaaran, sarvochch shasak, sabse chhote kan se bhi sukshm, sabka aadhar, achintya, sooraj ki tarah chamakdar, andhere se pare.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Mrityu ke samay mujhe yaad karte hue, indriyon ke dwar band kar do aur man ko hriday mein sthit karo. Fir, dhyaan mein leen hokar, saari urja ko sir ki taraf upar kendrit karo. Is avastha mein divya naam, Om jo avinashi Brahman ka pratinidhitva karta hai, use dohrate hue, tum shareer se bahar jaoge aur param lakshya prapt karoge.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Main us vyakti ko asaani se mil jaata hoon jo hamesha mujhe yaad rakhta hai aur kisi aur cheez se nahi judta. Aisa vyakti sachcha yogi hai, Arjuna.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Brahmand mein har praani punarjanm ke adheen hai, Arjuna, sivaay uske jo mujhse ek hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Sooraj ke uttaree marg ke chhah maheene, prakaash ka marg, aag ka, din ka, shukla paksh ka, Brahman ke jaanane waalon ko param lakshya tak le jaate hain. Sooraj ke dakshinee marg ke chhah maheene, dhuen ka marg, raat ka, krishna paksh ka, any aatmaon ko chandrama ke prakaash aur punarjanm tak le jaate hain.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Meri nigrani mein prakriti ke niyam apna raasta apnate hain. Is tarah duniya gati mein hai; is tarah jeevant aur nirvjiv cheezein banti hain.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Main hoon anushthaan aur yagya; main hoon sachchi dava aur mantr. Main hoon arpan aur aag jo ise bhasm karti hai, aur wo jise yeh arpit kiya jaata hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Main is brahmand ka pita aur mata hoon, aur dada bhi; main iska poora aadhar hoon. Main sabhi gyan ka yog hoon, shuddhikarta, Om ka akshar; main hoon pavitra granth, Rig, Yajur aur Sama Veda.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Main jeevan ka lakshya hoon, sabka bhagwan aur aadhar, antaryami, sabka nivaas. Main hoon ekmatra sharan, ek sachcha dost; main hoon srishti ka aarambh, sthayi aur ant; main hoon garbha aur shaashwat beej.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Jo log Vedon mein diye gaye anushthaanon ka paalan karte hain, jo yagya karte hain aur soma lete hain, wo khud ko burai se mukt karte hain aur devtaaon ke vishaal swarg ko prapt karte hain, jahaan wo divya aanand ka anubhav karte hain. Jab wo ise poori tarah se anubhav kar lete hain, to unka punya khatm ho jaata hai aur wo mrityu ki is bhoomi par laut aate hain. Is tarah Vedic anushthaanon ka paalan karte hue, par ichhaon ki anant shrinkhala mein fase hue, wo aate hain aur jaate hain.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Jo log meri pooja karte hain aur lagatar mujh par dhyaan karte hain, bina kisi any vichar ke - main unki sabhi zarooraton ko poora karunga.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Jo log devtaaon ki pooja karte hain, wo devtaaon ke lok mein jaayenge; jo log apne poorvajon ki pooja karte hain, wo mrityu ke baad unke saath ek ho jaayenge. Jo log bhooton ki pooja karte hain, wo bhoot ban jaayenge; par mere bhakt mujh tak aayenge.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Apne man ko mujhse bhar lo; mujhse pyaar karo; meri seva karo; hamesha meri pooja karo. Apne hriday mein mujhe khojte hue, tum ant mein mujhse ek ho jaoge.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Sabhi granth mujhe tak le jaate hain; main unka lekhak aur unka gyan hoon.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Bhishma, Drona, Jayadratha, Karna aur kai any pahle se hi maare ja chuke hain. Unhe maaro jinhe maine maara hai. Hichkichao mat. Is yudh mein lado aur tum apne shatruon par vijay prapt karoge.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Na Vedon ke gyan se, na yagya se, na daan se, na anushthaanon se, na hee kathor tapasya se kisi any martya ne wo dekha hai jo tumne dekha hai, O veer Arjuna.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Bhetar gyan hai yaantraik abhyaas se. Gyaan se bhetar hai dhyaan. Par aur bhetar hai parinaamon ke prati asakti ka samarpan, kyunki iske baad turant shanti hoti hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Kuch log dhyaan ke abhyaas se apne andar Atma ko mahsus karte hain, kuch gyan ke marg se, aur kuch nishkaam seva se. Any log in margon ko nahi jaan sakte hain; lekin ek prabuddh shikshak ke nirdeshon ko sunkar aur unka paalan karke, wo bhi mrityu se pare chale jaate hain.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Suraj ki chamak, jo duniya ko ujagar karti hai, chandrama aur aag ki chamak - ye meri shobha hain.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Shaanti, komalta, maun, aatm-sanyam aur shuddhta: ye man ke anushasan hain.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Swaarthi kaaryon se parhez karna ek tarah ka tyaag hai, jise sannyasa kaha jaata hai; kaary ke phal ka tyaag karna dusra hai, jise tyaga kaha jaata hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Steer pyaar ke saath meri seva karke, ek aadmi ya aurat gunon se pare jaata hai. Aisa ek Brahman ke saath ekta ke liye laayak hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Jab wo dekhte hain ki srishti ki vividhata us ekta mein sthit hai aur usse badh rahi hai, to we Brahman mein purnata prapt karte hain.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Maine tumhare saath is gahari sachchai ko saanjha kiya hai, Arjuna. Jo ise samajhte hain, we gyan prapt karenge; unhonne wo kiya hoga jo karna hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Mai tumhe gyaan ke in bahumully shabdo ko deta hu; un par vichaar karo aur phir apni marzi se karo.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Nirbhikta adhyatmikta ki pehli zaroorat hai. Darpoak kabhi bhi naitik nahi ho sakte.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Tum khud dukh bhogna nahi chahte. Tum doosron ko dukh kaise de sakte ho? Har hatya ek suicide hai. Anant, aanandmay aur swabhavik avastha ko ajnaan ke is jeevan ne daba diya hai. Is tarah vartmaan jeevan anant, pavitra astitva ki hatya ke kaaran hai. Kya yeh suicide ka maamla nahi hai?
author: Ramana Maharishi

quote: Hinsa se mukt hona har insaan ka kartavya hai. Hamare dimaag mein badle, nafrat ya bure vichar nahi aane chahiye. Doosron ko chot pahunchane se nafrat paida hoti hai.
author: Swami Shivananda

quote: O dhyaan ke premi, shuddh aur saaf bano. Mann, vachan aur shareer mein ahinsa ka paalan karo. Kisi aur ka dil kabhi na dukhao. Kisi aur ki bhavnaon ko chot pahunchane se bacho. Kisi ko nuksaan na pahunchao. Sabki madad karo. Na daro aur na hi doosron ko darao.
author: Swami Muktananda

quote: Jo koi bhi hinsa mein vishwas karta hai aur doosron ko chot pahunchata rehta hai, wo khud kabhi shant nahi ho sakta.
author: Swami Satchidananda

quote: Jaante hue bhi kisi mamooli keede jaise jo, khatmal ya machhar ko bhi na maarein. Kisi stri, dhan ya rajya par kabza karne ke liye bhi hinsa ka prayog na karein. Yagya ke maqsad se bhi kabhi kisi jaanwar ko na maarein. Ahinsa sabhi dharmon mein sabse mahan hai.
author: Swami Sahajanand

quote: Sakhti se kahun to, bina kisi hinsa ke koi bhi gatividhi aur koi bhi udyog sambhav nahi hai, chahe wo kitni bhi kam ho. Yahan tak ki jeene ki prakriya bhi bina kisi hinsa ke sambhav nahi hai. Humein jo karna hai wo ise jitna ho sake kam karna hai.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Ahinsa ka test jalan ka abhav hai. Wo insaan jiska dil kisi ko bhi nuksaan pahunchane ke baare mein kabhi nahi sochta, jo apne sabse bade dushman ki samriddhi par bhi khush hota hai, wo insaan bhakta hai, wo yogi hai, wo sabka guru hai.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: Agar tum baingan ka paudha lagate ho, to tum baingan hi tod sakte ho. Agar tum achchhai bote ho, to tum achchhai hi kaat sakte ho. Agar tum burai bote ho to tum burai hi kaatoge. Sabke saath achchha karo. Bhagwan tumhare andar hai. Mat maaro. Gussa mat karo.
author: Shiva Yogaswami

quote: Patanjali ka 'ahinsa' se matlab tha maarne ki ichha ko door karna. Jeevan ke sabhi roopon ko maya ki hawa par baraabar adhikaar hai. Sabhi aadmi vinaash ke josh par kabu paakar is sach ko samajh sakte hain.
author: Shri Yukteshwar

quote: Hindu sant poore jeevan ko dekhta hai. Agar wo nahi ladta, to isliye nahi ki wo sabhi ladaiyon ko bekar samajhta hai, balki isliye ki usne apni ladaiyan khatm kar lee hain. Usne khud aur duniya ke beech sabhi matbhedon par kabu pa liya hai aur ab wo aaraam kar raha hai.
author: Dr. S Radhakrishnan

quote: Sarvochch Brahman sachchai, gyan aur aanand (sat-chit-ananda) se lakshit hai, aur yahi ekmatra sachhai hai. Brahmand ko sach maana jaata hai, kyunki ise Brahman par adhyaropit kiya gaya hai, jaise aakaash par neela rang adhyaropit kiya gaya hai. Sabhi pramanon dwara nakaratmak kiye jaane wale asatya hone chahiye. Par jo itna apramanit nahi hai wo sach hona chahiye, agar wo har samay sach hai. Jeevant aur nirvjiv Brahman ke astitva ko saabit karte hain. Jab koi kehta hai, 'Main Brahman ko nahi jaanta', tab bhi ise uske astitva ke pramaan ke roop mein liya jaana chahiye.
author: Adi Shankaracharya

quote: Sarvochch Vyakti anupam hai, aur khud mein anant aanand hai. Wo kisi aur ka aanand bhi ban jaata hai, kyunki uski aanand ki prakriti nirpeksh aur sarvabhaumik hai. Jab Brahman kisi ke chintan ka vishay ban jaata hai, to wo (dhyani) aanandmay ban jaata hai. Is tarah sarvochch Brahman gunon ki anant aur anupam utkarsh ka saagar hai. Wo sabhi buraiyon se pare hai. Uski shobha ka vistar apeet hai. Wo utkarsh condescension, maternal karuna aur sarvochch sundarta mein samriddh hai. Wo pramukh astittva hai. Vyakti aatma uske adheen hai. Agar anveshak is sambandh ki poori chetna ke saath Sarvochch par dhyaan karta hai aur agar Sarvochch Brahman jis par dhyaan kiya gaya hai, bhakt ke liye sarvochch prem ka vishay ban jaata hai, to wo khud bhakt ki bhagwan-sakshatkar ko prabhaavit karta hai.
author: Ramanujacharya

quote: Bhagwan ka dridh aur achal prem jo is mahaan mahima ke paryapt gyan aur aatmvishwas par aadharit prem aur sneh ke sabhi bandhanon se upar uthta hai, use bhakti (bhakti) kaha jaata hai. Wo akele moksha (mukti) ka saadhan hai.
author: Madhvacharya

quote: Bhagwan ko dekhne ki koshish na karo, balki aise kaam karo ki Bhagwan tumhe dekhna chahenge.
author: Bhaktisiddhanta Sarasvati

quote: Kisi ke kaamon ki safalta bhaagy aur vyaktigat prayatn par baraabar aadharit hoti hai. Bhaagy pichle jeevan mein kiye gaye prayatnon ka phal hai. Ek rath keval ek pahiye par nahi chal sakta, isliye vyaktigat prayatn ke bina bhaagy akele kuch bhi poora nahi karta.
author: Sage Yajnavalkya

quote: Jaise ek hi paani ko vibhinn logon dwara vibhinn naamon se pukara jaata hai, kuch ise 'paani' kehte hain, kuch 'vari', kuch 'acqua' aur kuch 'pani', isliye ek Sachidananda - Astitva-Aanand-Nirpeksh - ko kuch dwara Bhagwan ke roop mein, kuch dwara Allah ke roop mein, kuch dwara Hari ke roop mein aur any dwara Brahman ke roop mein pukara jaata hai. Ek kumhar ki dukaan mein vibhinn aakaaron aur roopon ke bartan hote hain - bartan, jarr, thali, plate aadi - lekin sabhi ek hi mitti se bane hote hain. Isliye Bhagwan ek hai, lekin vibhinn yugon aur desh mein vibhinn naamon aur roopon ke antargat pooja ki jaati hai.
author: Shri Ramakrishna

quote: Yeh kehna ki koi Bhagwan nahi hai aisa hai jaise kehna 'Mere paas koi jeebh nahi hai'.
author: Amritanandamayi Devi

quote: Humein hamesha yaad rakhna chahiye ki har koi apne jeevan ke liye zimmedar hai.
author: Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Hamare desh mein bandaron ko pakadne ki ek vishisht vidhi hai. Is prakriya mein ek bade bartan ko ek chhote muh ke saath laana aur bartan ke andar kuch aisi vastu rakhna shamil hai jo bandar ko aakarshit karti hai. Bandar bartan ke andar apna haath dalega aur vastu ka ek mutthi pakad lega. Fir wo bartan ke andar se apna haath nikaal paane mein asamarth hoga. Wo soch lega ki bartan ke andar koi uske haath ko pakad raha hai. Fir wo bartan ke saath bhaagne ka prayatn karega, lekin bandar is tarah fas jaata hai. Koi bhi bandar ko nahi pakad raha hai. Bandar ne khud ko fasa liya hai, kyunki usne apne haath mein itni saari vastu le li hai. Jis pal wo apne haath mein vastu ko jaane deta hai, wo azaad ho jaayega.
author: Satya Sai Baba

quote: Yeh Divya Astitva, Sachidananda, ek hi samay mein niji aur gair-niji hai: yeh ek Astitva hai aur sabhi satyon, shaktiyon, existences ka udbhav aur aadhaar hai, lekin wo ek trascendent Conscious Astitva aur All-Person bhi hai jinme sabhi conscious praani swayam aur vyaktitv hain; kyunki wo unka sarvochch Swyam aur sarvabhaumik antaryami Presence hai. Brahmand mein aatma ke liye yeh zaroori hai ki wo khud ke is sach ko jaane, Divya Astitva ke saath ek ho jaaye, apne swabhav ko Divya Swabhav tak, apne astitva ko Divya Astitva tak, apni chetna ko Divya Chetna mein, apne hone ke aanand ko Divya Hone ke Prakash mein badhaye.
author: Shri Aurobindo

quote: All-Loving Father, Great Lord, aatma par apni upsthiti majboori se nahi daalte, jo unhe prapt karne ke liye abhi pakki nahi hai. Anant dhairya ke saath, wo samsara mein aatma ke sangharsh ko dekhte hain, kyunki sangharsh aatma ki shaktiyon ke poorn vikas ke liye zaroori hai.
author: Lokacharya Pillai

quote: Dharm keval achchhai sikhata hai. Jhagde aur ladaiyan aadmi ke apne swarthi ahankar ke kaaran hoti hain. Dharm fragment ya divide karna nahi sikhata. Jhagde dharmon ke beech nahi balki rajnetaon ke beech hote hain.
author: Pramukh Swami

quote: Ek aadmi ka dil hamesha core mein achchha hota hai. Yeh vibhinn aantrik kaarano ke kaaran bahar se rusted ho sakta hai lekin uski achchhai hamesha waisi hi rehti hai, chahe bahari dikhawa kuch bhi ho. Yeh ek gobhi ke sir ki tarah hai jiski bahari parat kharab ho sakti hai lekin andari paraten apni tazgi banaye rakhti hain.
author: Vinoba Bhave

quote: Har khushi ke baad dukh aata hai; wo door ya paas ho sakte hain. Aatma jitni adhik advanced hoti hai, utni hi tezi se ek doosre ka anusaran karta hai. Humein jo chahiye wo na khushi hai na dukh. Dono hi hume apne sachche swabhav ko bhula dete hain; dono hi zanjeerein hain, ek lohe ki, doosri sone ki; dono ke peeche Atman hai, jo na khushi jaanta hai na dukh. Yeh sthitiyaan hain aur sthitiyaan hamesha badalni chahiye; lekin aatma ki prakriti aanand hai, shanti hai, badalti nahi hai. Humein ise prapt nahi karna hai, hamare paas yeh hai; keval mail ko dho dalo aur ise dekho.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: Sachchi ahinsa ke marg ko hinsa se kahin adhik saahas ki zaroorat hoti hai.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Jab vyakti behtar ke liye badalte hain, to samaj badlega, aur jab samaj badlega, to desh badlega.
author: Pramukh Swami

quote: Yaad rakho ki mrityu har pal tumhara intezaar kar rahi hai.
author: Swami Shivananda

quote: Ek reservoir ko bhar kar, tum usse jude sabhi pipes ko paani supply karte ho. Agar tum ek ped ki jad mein paani dalte ho, to wo sabhi shakhon tak pahunchega. Isi tarah, Bhagwan se pyaar karke, hum sabhi se pyaar karte hain. Ye wo hee Bhagwan hai jo har kisi ke andar basta hai.
author: Amritanandamayi Devi

quote: Tum ye shareer nahi ho; tum ye mann nahi ho. Tum aatma ho. Ye sabse bada sach hai.
author: Shri Nirmila Devi

quote: Yadyapi ham mein se lagbhag har koi adhyatmik mamlon par adbhut tarike se bol sakta hai, jab kaary ki baat aati hai aur ek adhyatmik jeevan jeene ki, to hum khud ko bahut kamzor paate hain. Aatma ko tez karne ke liye, aavesh kisi any aatma se aana chahiye. Wo vyakti jiski aatma se aisa aavesh aata hai, use guru kaha jaata hai.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: Ek sansarik aadmi ke liye, ek Bhagwan-madhosh vyakti paagal dikhai dega aur wo us par hansega. Lekin, Bhagwan-madhosh aadmi ke liye, sansarik log pagal, bewaqoof, gumrah, andhe dikhai dete hain. Sabhi pagalpanon mein jo insaan ko pareshan karte hain, Bhagwan-paagalpan sabse kam nuksaan deh hai, sabse faydemand.
author: Satya Sai Baba

quote: Tumhara buniyadi swabhav, vishwas karo mera, khaane peene aur sone ki is bejaan, udas routine se nafrat karta hai. Ye kuch aisa chahta hai jo ise pata hai ki isne kho diya hai shanthi, aantrik santushti. Ye mamooli aur asthayi ke bandhan se mukti chahta hai. Har koi iske liye apne dil mein lalayat hai.
author: Satya Sai Baba

quote: Agar tum Krishna ke liye kaam kar rahe ho, to yeh Krishna ki ichha hai ki tum safal ho ya nahi. Iska matlab hai ki yeh mat socho ki kyunki tum Krishna chetan ho, tum hamesha safal rahoge. Nahi. Isse koi farq nahi padta - agar tum asafal bhi ho, to tumhe dridh roop se pata hona chahiye ki Krishna ki ichha ke bina kuch nahi ho sakta.
author: Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Insaan ka itihaas uske amar swayam ki sakshatkar ki khoj mein agyat ki yatra ka itihaas hai - uski aatma.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Aankh ke badle aankh keval poori duniya ko andha bana degi.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Ek dhanurdhari ka teer ya ek kavi ke shabdon ka kya fayda, agar wo dil mein dakhil hote hain lekin sir ko ghumate nahi hain?
author: Rupa Goswami

quote: Safalta ka keval ek kaaran ya rahasya hai, adhyatmik guru ki prasannata kamane ka ekal lakshya. Agar wo prasann hain to hum pragati karte hain. Agar wo prasann nahi hain to pragati ka koi chinh nahi hai.
author: Pramukh Swami

quote: Hamare paas badi sankhya mein anuyayi nahi hain. Jaise hi aap ek heere bechne ki koshish karte hain, aap bahut sare grahkon ki umeed nahi kar sakte. Fir bhi, ek heera ek heera hai, bhale hee koi grahak na ho. Grahkon ki sankhya test nahi hai.
author: Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Hamare samaj ke demythicisation aur desacralisation ne us vishesh modern fanci ko liberal application se tej kar diya hai ki pragati rekhik honi chahiye. Yeh mudra, jo purane se hamesha behtar hone ke liye naye ka anumaan lagati hai, wo pashchimi vritti se rekhik vichar ke liye tarkik roop se badhti hai. Rekhik pragati ka siddhant prachin gyan ko aadhunikta mein daakhil hone se mana karta hai, yeh aadesh deta hai ki naye aur vibhinn vastavikta roop anivarya roop se purane sabhi models ko supplant aur replace karen. Satah ki drishti se, yeh aksar sach hota hai, kyunki kathaayen lagatar apne sandeshon ko vyakt karne ke naye tarike viksit karti hain, aise tarike jo un nayi paristhitiyon ke liye fit hain jinme yeh kathaayen lagatar khud ko paa rahi hain. Lekin kathaayen apne purane sandeshon ko nahi chhodti hain taaki naye load kiye ja saken (jaise ki, ‘mukti dharm shaastri’ Christian katha ko aisa karne ke liye jhukaane ki koshish kar rahe hain): iske bajaye, jeevit kathaayen usi shaashwat sandesh ko sancharit karne ke naye tarike viksit karti hain.
author: Dr. Robert Svoboda

quote: Pashchimi sanskriti vyakti ko azaadi deti hai, chahe wo buzurgon, jeevansathi aur bachchon ko chot pahuncha sake. Poorvi sanskriti buzurgon, jeevansathi aur bachchon ke prati kartavya ki seema mein azaadi deti hai. Kartavya ki bhaavna Hindu sanskriti ka aadhaar hai, aur kartavya ka paalan karne mein vyakti ko sabse uchch yoga ki uplabdhi ke maadhyam se khud ke andar se azaadi milti hai.
author: Shivaya Subramuniyaswami

quote: Hum sabse vinamrata se tumhare aage jhukte hain, O Sarvochch Bhagwan. Tumhare aadesh par samay ka mahaan pahiya chalta hai. Tum shaashwat ho, aur shaashwat se pare.
author: Atharva Veda

quote: Wo jo sabhi ko teevrata se prem karta hai, sabhi jeevit praaniyon mein khud ka ek hissa dekhna shuru kar deta hai. Wo sabhi ka premi ban jaata hai, Sarvabhaumik Aanand ka ek hissa aur parcel. Wo khushi ki dhara ke saath bahta hai, aur har aatma se samriddh hota hai.
author: Yajur Veda

quote: Manav shareer Bhagwan ka mandir hai. Jo koi andar chetna ki jyoti jalata hai use sachchi jyoti milti hai. Tumhare bhitari asthan ki pavitra jyoti nirantar ujwal hai. Ekta ka anubhav manav prayatnon ki purti hai. Jeevan ke rahasya ujagar hote hain.
author: Rig Veda

quote: Swargiya prem ka geet gao, O gayak! Anant anugrah aur aanand ka divya jharna tumhari aatma mein pravesh kare. Brahma, (Divya Ek), Apni swargiya ungaliyon se tumhari bhitari aatma ke taaron ko chhede, Aur apne andar Apni maujoodgi ko mahsus kare. Humein ek divya aawaz se aashirwad de Ki hum apne jeevan ke harp-strings ko tune kar saken Tumhe prem ke geet gaane ke liye.
author: Rig Veda

quote: Har cheez mein wo antaryami Swyam hai. Wo sachhai hai; wo sarvochch Swyam hai.
author: Chandogya Upanishad

quote: Hriday ke kamal par dhyaan karte hue, uske kendra mein nishkalank hai; atyant shuddh, spashth, shokrahit; achintya; avyakt, anant roop wala; aanandmay, shaant, amar; Brahma ka garbh hai.
author: Kaivalyopanishad

quote: Jin logon ke hriday mein OM nitya gungunata hai, wo sachmuch bhagyashali hain aur gahre prem se pyare hain, jaise ki wo apne aap hain. Sarvajna Aatma kabhi janm nahi leta, na hi mrityu ko prapt hota hai. Kaaran aur prabhav se pare, yeh Aatma shashwat aur avikari hai. Jab shareer mrityu ko prapt hota hai, Aatma nahi marta.
author: Katha Upanishad

quote: Purn mantram AUM avibhajya, parasparik, man mein nitya gungunata rehta hai. Is brahmik kampan mein sthit rahkar, rishi dar, kshaya aur mrityu se pare, anant shanti mein pravesh karta hai.
author: Prashna Upanishad

quote: O Sarvochch Ishwar! Tum anant ho; brahmand bhi anant hai! Anant se anant nikalne par bhi anant hi rahta hai! O Sarvochch Ishwar! Har jagah shanti ho, shanti ho, shanti ho!
author: Ishawashya Upanishad

quote: O sadhak, apne aatma ki sachchi prakriti ko jaano aur uske saath poori tarah se ek ho jao. O Prabhu, (hum prapt karein) shashwat prakash aur aanand ki chetna. Hum apni jeevan ko manavta ki seva aur unhein divyata ki aur badhane ka sankalp karein.
author: Yajur Veda

quote: O Brahma, humein asat se sat tak le chalo. O Brahma, humein andhkaar se prakash tak le chalo. O Brahma, humein mrityu se amaratva tak le chalo. Shanti, Shanti, Shanti, Om.
author: Brhadaranyaka Upanishad

quote: Is din ko dekho, kyunki yeh jeevan hai, jeevan ka pran hai. Iske chhote avadhi mein tumhare astitva ki sabhi vastavikta hain; vikas ka aanand, kriya ka gaurav, sundarta ka teevrata. Kal sirf ek sapna hai, aur kal ek drishti hai. Lekin aaj, jo achchhi tarah se jee liya gaya hai, wo har kal ko sukh ka sapna aur har kal ko aasha ka drishti banata hai. Isliye is din ko achchhi tarah se dekho.
author: Purani Sanskrit

quote: Uchch Aatma, anant aanand, avasthik chetna, jo bhi mahatvapurn granthon ya yoga ke madhyam se prapt hoti hai, uska anubhav karke, us anandmay avastha mein khoye raho, kyunki tumne hamesha ke liye sabhi bandhanon ko tod diya hai.
author: Svarajyasiddhi

quote: Uska ek bindu ka aanand poore brahmand ko aanand se bhar deta hai. Uske prakash mein sab kuch roshan hota hai. Uska darshan karne ke baad sab kuch vyarth lagta hai. Main sachmuch us Param Shashwat Aatma ka hoon.
author: Vijnanananka

quote: Jagruk aatma us Brahman (us divya tatva) ka poori roshni apne hriday mein pakad leta hai jo avyakt, sarvashuddh aanand, atul, kaal se pare, hamesha swatantra aur ichha se pare hai.
author: Vivekachudamani

quote: Tej aur gupt, Aatma hriday mein basa hai. Jo bhi gati karta hai, saans leta hai, khulta hai aur band hota hai, wo Aatma mein basa hai. Yeh prem ka srot hai aur prem ke madhyam se hi jaana ja sakta hai, vichar ke madhyam se nahi. Yeh jeevan ka lakshya hai. Is lakshya ko prapt karo!
author: Mundaka Upanishad

quote: Sab kuch badalta hai sansarik jagat mein, lekin prem ka sarvochch Ishwar avikari hai. Use dhyaan mein rakho, usmein leen ho jao, is alagav ki sapne se jag jao.
author: Shvetashvatara Upanishad

quote: Tat Tvam Asi: 'Tum Divya Ho'
author: Chandogya Upanishad

quote: Jaise paani paani mein, aag aag mein, aur hawa hawa mein ek ho jaati hai, is tarah mann Anant Mann mein ek ho jaata hai aur is tarah antim mukti prapt karta hai.
author: Maitri Upanishad

quote: Jaise sooraj chamakta hai aur sabhi jagah ko prakaash se bhar deta hai, upar, neeche, paar, usi tarah Prem ke Ishwar chamakte hain aur sabhi jeevon ke hriday ko bhar dete hain.
author: Shvetashvatara Upanishad

quote: Tum wo ho jo tumhari gahri, prerna dene wali ichha hai. Jaisi tumhari ichha hai, waisi tumhari ichha shakti hai. Jaisi tumhari ichha shakti hai, waisa tumhara karma hai. Jaisa tumhara karma hai, waisa tumhara naseeb hai.
author: Brihadaranyaka Upanishad

quote: Indriyon se pare vishay hain, vishayon se pare mann hai, mann se pare buddhi hai, aur buddhi se pare mahaan Atman hai.
author: Katha Upanishad

quote: Mujhe asatya se satya ki or le chalo, mujhe andhere se prakaash ki or le chalo, mujhe mrityu se amaratva ki or le chalo.
author: Brihad-Aranyaka Upanishad

quote: Mann ko do tarah ka kaha jaata hai, shuddh aur ashuddh bhi. Ashuddh ichha ke saath milan se, shuddh, ichha se poori tarah mukt.
author: Maitri Upanishad

quote: Ishwar sab mein sab kuch hai. Wo karma, gyan aur sarvochch achchhai hai. Unhe hriday ke kamal mein chhipe hue jaanana, agyaan ki ganth ko kholna hai.
author: Shvetashvatara Upanishad

quote: Brahmand mein aur dharti par jo bhi jeevit hai, usmein Ishwar ki mahima dekho. Nashwar ko chhodkar, Shashwat mein aanand dhoondo.
author: Isha Upanishad

quote: Jise mann dwara grahan nahi kiya ja sakta, lekin jiske dwara, we kehte hain, mann ko grahan kiya jaata hai. Use keval Brahman ke roop mein jaano aur use nahi jiski log yahan pooja karte hain.
author: Kena Upanishad

quote: Us amar Brahman akele pehle hai, wo Brahman peeche hai, wo Brahman dayen aur bayen hai. Brahman akele sabhi jagah upar aur neeche vyapt hai; yah brahmand akele us sarvochch Brahman hai.
author: Mundaka Upanishad

quote: Yeh akshar Om sachmuch Brahman hai. Yah akshar sarvochch hai. Jo koi bhi is akshar ko jaanta hai, wo apni sabhi ichhaon ko prapt karta hai.
author: Katha Upanishad

quote: Om dhanush hai; Atman teer hai; Brahman ko nishana kaha jaata hai. Ise ekagrachit mann se maarna hai. Fir Atman Brahman ke saath ek ho jaata hai, jaise teer nishane ke saath.
author: Mundaka Upanishad

quote: Gyanwaan Aatma janm nahi leta; wo marta nahi hai. Wo kisi cheez se nahi nikla hai; usse kuch nahi nikla hai. Janmarahit, shaashwat, hamesha rahne wala aur prachin, wo nahi maara jaata jab shareer maara jaata hai.
author: Katha Upanishad

quote: Gyanwaan aadmi sabhi jeevon ko Aatma mein aur Aatma ko sabhi jeevon mein dekhta hai; is kaaran se wo kisi se nafrat nahi karta.
author: Isa Upanishad

quote: Yeh nishchay hee mann hai jo manushyon ke bandhan aur mukti ka kaaran hai. Wo mann jo indriya-vishayon se juda hua hai, bandhan ki or le jaata hai, jabki indriya-vishayon se alag hone par wo mukti ki or le jaane ki pravritti rakhta hai.
author: Amrita-Bindu Upanishad

quote: Wo Aatma jo sookshm se bhi sookshm aur mahaan se bhi mahaan hai, har praani ke hriday mein sthit hai. Wo jo ichhaon se mukt hai, mann aur indriyon ki shaanti ke madhyam se Aatma ki mahima dekhta hai aur dukh se mukt ho jaata hai.
author: Katha Upanishad

quote: Yah Atman, tejomay aur shuddh, jise nishpaap sannyaasi shareer ke bheetar nivaas karte hue dekhte hain, satyata, tapasya, sahi gyan aur brahmacharya ke nirantar abhyaas se prapt hota hai.
author: Mundaka Upanishad

quote: Drishya ke liye, sabhi cheezein sachmuch Aatma ban gayi hain: uske liye kya bhram, kya dukh ho sakta hai jo us ekta ko dekhta hai?
author: Isa Upanishad

quote: Apne aap ko param Atma mein ghula do, jaise ghade ke bheetar ki jagah anant jagah mein ghul jaati hai; fir, Anant ki tarah hamesha ke liye shaant ho jao, O rishi!
author: Adhyatma Upanishad

quote: Us mahaan aur sarvavyapi Aatma ko jaankar, jisase koi (vastuon ko) neend aur jagran avastha donon mein dekhta hai, buddhiman aadmi ab shok nahi karta.
author: Katha Upanishad

quote: Moorkh, andhere mein base hue, lekin apni kalpna mein buddhiman aur vyarth vidwatta se bhare hue, bhatakte rehte hain, kai beemariyon se peedit, jaise andhe aadmi andhon dwara le jaye jaate hain.
author: Mundaka Upanishad

quote: Ahankaar ki grip se mukt, jaise chandrama (grahan ke baad), poorn, hamesha aanandmay, swayam-prakashit, koi apni asal roop ko prapt karta hai.
author: Adhyatma Upanishad

quote: Wo jo sabhi jeevon ko keval Aatma mein dekhta hai, aur Aatma ko sabhi jeevon mein, us darshan ke kaaran koi dvesh nahi karta hai.
author: Isavasya Upanishad

quote: Wo jo keval chetna hai, jo sarvavyapi hai, jo shaashwat hai, jo sarv-poorn hai, jo aanand ke roop ka hai aur jo avinashi hai, wo keval sachcha Brahman (anant chetna) hai.
author: Varaha Upanishad

quote: Chahe shareer abhi nasht ho jaaye ya chandrama aur taaron ki umr tak rahe, mujhe kya farak padta hai jab chetna akele mere shareer ke roop mein hai? Aakash ko ghade mein kya farak padta hai, chahe wo (ghada) abhi nasht ho jaaye ya lambe samay tak rahe.
author: Varaha Upanishad

quote: Bandhan aath shaktiyon ki ichha se prerit kalpana hai.
author: Niralamba Upanishad

quote: Manushya 'mera' dwara bandha hai, lekin wo 'mera nahi' dwara riha kiya gaya hai. Use bahari cheezon se sambandhit sabhi vicharon ko tyag dena chahiye aur isee tarah aantrik sandarbhon ke saath bhi. O Ribhu, sabhi vicharon ko tyag kar, tumhe hamesha (apni aatma mein) santusht rahna chahiye.
author: Varaha Upanishad

quote: Jaise doodh mein chhipe hue makkhan, shuddh chetna har jeev mein rehti hai. Use lagatar mann ki mathani se mathna chahiye.
author: Amrita-Bindu Upanishad

quote: Pahle badlavheen avastha mein hona aur fir Brahman (anant chetna) ki (sachchi) prakriti ki pahchaan ke kaaran us avastha ko (bhi) poori tarah se bhool jaana - ise samadhi kaha jaata hai.
author: Tejo-Bindu Upanishad

quote: Atma ka ehsaas karne ke liye, sab kuch tyag do. Sabhi (vastuon) ko chhod kar, apne aap ko us cheez mein shaamil kar lo jo bachi hai.
author: Annapurna Upanishad

quote: Jab hriday mein sabhi ichhaen gayab ho jaati hain, to ek martya amar ho jaata hai aur yahan Brahman (anant chetna) ko prapt karta hai.
author: Katha Upanishad

quote: Jo log Brahman ke baare mein tarkon mein chatur hain, lekin Brahman se sambandhit kaarya ke bina (anant chetna) aur jo duniya se bahut juda hua hai - wo nishchay hee baar baar (is duniya mein) apne ajnana (agyaan) ke madhyam se paida hote hain.
author: Tejo-Bindu Upanishad

quote: Jaise nadiyan, neeche bahate hue, apne naam aur roop ko kho deti hain, samudra mein gayab ho jaati hain, isee tarah ek buddhiman, naam aur roop se mukt hokar, Purusha ko prapt karta hai, jo mahaan se bhi mahaan hai.
author: Mundaka Upanishad

quote: Utho! Jaago! Mahaan ke paas jao aur seekho. Jaise ek razar ka tez kinara hota hai, waisa wo raasta hai, buddhiman kehte hain - chalne mein kathin aur paar karne mein mushkil.
author: Katha Upanishad

quote: Jo cheez shabd se vyakt nahi ki ja sakti, lekin jiske dwara shabd vyakt hota hai. Use hi Brahman samjho, aur use nahi jise log yahan pooja karte hain.
author: Kena Upanishad

quote: Jo cheez mann se samjhi nahi ja sakti, lekin jiske dwara, log kehte hain, mann samjha jaata hai. Use hi Brahman samjho, aur use nahi jise log yahan pooja karte hain.
author: Kena Upanishad

quote: Jo cheez aankh se dekhi nahi ja sakti, lekin jiske dwara aankh dekhi jaati hai. Use hi Brahman samjho, aur use nahi jise log yahan pooja karte hain.
author: Kena Upanishad

quote: Jo cheez kaan se nahi suna ja sakta, lekin jiske dwara suna jaata hai. Use hi Brahman samjho, aur use nahi jise log yahan pooja karte hain.
author: Kena Upanishad

quote: Bachche, anek tarikon se agyaan mein doobe hue, apne aap ko prashansha karte hain, kehkar: humne jeevan ka maqsad poora kar liya hai. Kyunki ye karma karne wale sachai nahi jaante apni lagav ke kaaran, wo swarg se girte hain, dukh bhogte hain jab unke kaam ka phal khatm ho jaata hai.
author: Mundaka Upanishad

quote: Jaise behte nadiyan samudra mein gayab ho jaati hain, apne naam aur roop ko kho dete hue, waise hi ek gyaanwaan aadmi, naam aur roop se mukt hokar, us Purusha ko prapt karta hai jo sabse bada hai.
author: Mundaka Upanishad

quote: Yeh akshar Om sachmuch Brahman hai. Yeh akshar sarvochch hai. Jo koi bhi is akshar ko jaanta hai, wo apni sabhi ichhaon ko prapt karta hai.
author: Katha Upanishad

quote: Om dhanush hai; Atman teer hai; Brahman ko nishana kaha jaata hai. Ise ekagrachit mann se maarna hai. Phir Atman Brahman ke saath ek ho jaata hai, jaise teer nishane ke saath.
author: Mundaka Upanishad

quote: Gyaanwaan Aatma kabhi janm nahi leta; wo nahi marta. Wo kisi cheez se nahi nikla; kuch bhi usse nahi nikla. Janmarahit, shaashwat, hamesha rahne wala aur prachin, wo shareer ke marne par nahi maara jaata.
author: Katha Upanishad

quote: Yeh sachmuch mann hi hai jo manushyon ke bandhan aur mukti ka kaaran hai. Wo mann jo indriya-vishayon se juda hua hai, bandhan ki or le jaata hai; jabki indriya-vishayon se alag hone par wo mukti ki or le jaata hai.
author: Amrita-Bindu Upanishad

quote: Gyaanwaan aadmi sabhi jeevon ko Aatma mein aur Aatma ko sabhi jeevon mein dekhta hai; isliye wo kisi se nafrat nahi karta.
author: Isa Upanishad

quote: Wo Aatma jo sookshm se bhi sookshm aur mahaan se bhi mahaan hai, har praani ke hriday mein sthit hai. Jo ichhaon se mukt hota hai wo mann aur indriyon ki shaanti ke madhyam se Aatma ki mahima dekhta hai aur dukh se mukt ho jaata hai.
author: Katha Upanishad

quote: Yah Atman, tejomay aur shuddh, jise nishpaap sannyaasi shareer ke bheetar nivaas karte hue dekhte hain, satyata, tapasya, sahi gyan aur brahmacharya ke nirantar abhyaas se prapt hota hai.
author: Mundaka Upanishad

quote: Dekho! Sab kuch sachmuch Aatma ban gaya: uske liye kya bhram, kya dukh ho sakta hai jo us ekta ko dekhta hai?
author: Isa Upanishad

quote: Apne aap ko param Atma mein ghula do jaise ghade ka sthal anant sthal mein ghul jaata hai; fir anant ke roop mein hamesha ke liye shaant ho jao, O rishi!
author: Adhyatma Upanishad

quote: Us mahaan aur sarvavyapi Aatma ko jaan kar jisase koi (vastuon ko) neend aur jagran avastha donon mein dekhta hai, buddhiman aadmi ab shok nahi karta.
author: Katha Upanishad

quote: Moorkh jo andhere mein base hue hain lekin apni kalpna mein buddhiman aur vyarth vidwatta se bhare hue hain bhatak rahe hain; kai beemariyon se peedit hote hue jaise andhe aadmi andhon dwara le jaye jaate hain.
author: Mundaka Upanishad

quote: Ahankaar ki grip se mukt hote hue, chandrama ki tarah (grahan ke baad), poorn hamesha aanandmay aur swayam-prakashit hota hua apni asal roop ko prapt karta hai.
author: Adhyatma Upanishad

quote: Wo jo sabhi jeevon ko keval Aatma mein dekhta hai aur Aatma ko sabhi jeevon mein dekhta hai wo kisi bhi nafrat ko apne dikhayi gaye darshan ki wajah se nahi rakhta.
author: Isavasya Upanishad

quote: 'Wo jo sirf chetna hai jo sarvavyapi hai, jo shaashwat hai, jo sarv-poorn hai, jo aanand ke roop ka hai aur jo avinashi hai - wahi sachcha Brahman (anant chetna) hai.'
author: Varaha Upanishad

quote: Bandhan woh kalpana hai jo aath shaktiyon ki ichha se prerit hoti hai.
author: Niralamba Upanishad

quote: Chahe shareer abhi nasht ho ya chandrama aur taaron ki umr tak rahe, mujhe kya farak padta hai jab chetna akele mere shareer ke roop mein hai? Aakash ko ghade mein kya farak padta hai, chahe wo (ghada) abhi nasht ho jaaye ya lambe samay tak rahe.
author: Varaha Upanishad

quote: Jaise doodh mein chhipe hue makkhan, shuddh chetna har jeev mein rehti hai. Use lagatar mann ki mathani se mathna chahiye.
author: Amrita-Bindu Upanishad

quote: Manushya 'mera' dwara bandha hai, lekin wo 'mera nahi' dwara riha kiya gaya hai. Use bahari cheezon se sambandhit sabhi vicharon ko tyag dena chahiye aur is tarah aantrik sandarbhon ke saath bhi. O Ribhu, sabhi vicharon ko tyag kar, tumhe hamesha (apni aatma mein) santusht rahna chahiye.
author: Varaha Upanishad

quote: Atma ka ehsaas karne ke liye, sab kuch tyag do. Sabhi (vastuon) ko chhodkar, apne aap ko us cheez mein shaamil kar lo jo bachi hai.
author: Annapurna Upanishad

quote: Pehle avastha mein sthir rehna aur fir us avastha ko poori tarah bhool jaana jo Brahman (anant chetna) ki sahi prakriti ke gyaan ke kaaran hota hai - ise samadhi kaha jaata hai.
author: Tejo-Bindu Upanishad

quote: Jab hriday mein sabhi ichhaen gayab ho jaati hain, to ek martya amar ho jaata hai aur yahan Brahman (anant chetna) ko prapt karta hai.
author: Katha Upanishad

quote: Jo log Brahman ke baare mein tarkon mein chatur hain, lekin Brahman se sambandhit kaarya ke bina hain aur jo duniya se bahut juda hua hai - wo nishchay hee baar baar (is duniya mein) apne ajnana (agyaan) ke madhyam se paida hote hain.
author: Tejo-Bindu Upanishad

quote: Utho! Jaago! Mahaan ke paas jao aur seekho. Jaise ek tez dhar wali talwar wo raasta hai, waisa hi buddhiman kehte hain - chalne mein kathin aur paar karne mein mushkil.
author: Katha Upanishad

quote: Jaise behte nadiyan samudra mein gayab ho jaati hain, apne naam aur roop ko kho dete hue, waise hi ek gyaanwaan aadmi, naam aur roop se mukt hokar, us Purusha ko prapt karta hai jo sabse bada hai.
author: Mundaka Upanishad

quote: Jo cheez shabd se vyakt nahi ki ja sakti, lekin jiske dwara shabd vyakt hota hai. Use hi Brahman samjho, aur use nahi jise log yahan pooja karte hain.
author: Kena Upanishad

quote: Jo cheez mann se samjhi nahi ja sakti, lekin jiske dwara, log kehte hain, mann samjha jaata hai. Use hi Brahman samjho, aur use nahi jise log yahan pooja karte hain.
author: Kena Upanishad

quote: Jo cheez aankh se dekhi nahi ja sakti, lekin jiske dwara aankh dekhi jaati hai. Use hi Brahman samjho, aur use nahi jise log yahan pooja karte hain.
author: Kena Upanishad

quote: Jo cheez kaan se nahi suni ja sakti, lekin jiske dwara suni jaati hai. Use hi Brahman samjho, aur use nahi jise log yahan pooja karte hain.
author: Kena Upanishad

quote: Hamesha khana banaate samay ek shuddh vatavaran rakhna chahiye. Kabhi bhi gande haathon se bhojan na banayein. Isse kai tarah ke rog ho sakte hain aur shareer kamzor ho sakta hai.
author: Rigveda

quote: Kanjoos hone ka virodh karein aur daan mein pravarti rakhein kyunki isse aap amarta ki anant sampada paa sakte hain.
author: Rigveda

quote: Ahankaari vyakti kuch bhi prapt ya grahan nahi kar paate aur iske parinam swaroop unka ahankar nash ho jata hai.
author: Rigveda

quote: Sirf gyaan prapt karke hi manushya agyaanta se mukti pa sakta hai aur apne paapon ka naash kar sakta hai. Aisa vyakti swatantra hokar jeeta hai kyunki uska mann bhay se mukt ho chuka hai.
author: Rigveda

quote: Vishwaas ki kami, dhokha, kalah aur dwesh sirf dusht bhaavnaon ko janm dete hain. Sabhi ke hit mein hai ki in cheezon se bachkar pragati ke path par chalein.
author: Rigveda

quote: Manushya ke liye swasth aur nirogi rehna bahut zaroori hai kyunki swasth shareer mein hi swasth mann ka vaas hota hai.
author: Rigveda

quote: Gyaan ke bina manushya pashu se behtar nahi hota.
author: Rigveda

quote: Bhagwan bhi kewal unhe aashirvaad dete hain jo chintan-sheel, buddhimaan aur kamzoron ke rakshak hain.
author: Rigveda

quote: Aarambh mein andhkaar hi andhkaar se dhaka hua tha. Yah sab ek avibhajya sagar tha. Jo banta hai, jo shoonya se ghira tha, vo akela taapmaan ki shakti se paida hua.
author: Rigveda

quote: Asat nahi tha; sat bhi us samay nahi tha. Vaayumandal nahi tha, na hi aakaash jo aage hai. Kya chipaa tha? Kahaan? Kiske sanrakshan mein? Kya yeh pani tha? Ek athah khaai?
author: Rigveda

quote: Buddhi sabse shaktishaali hai aur kuch bhi iski pahunch se pare nahi hai.
author: Rigveda

quote: Ekagrata ka abhyas karke mann ko sthir kiya ja sakta hai. Ek sthir mann sahi nirnay lene aur vaanchit parinaam paane mein sahaayak hota hai.
author: Rigveda

quote: Mann tez daudne waale ghode ki tarah chanchal hai aur ise niyantrit karne ka ek hi tareeka hai - ise sabhi ke kalyan ke liye achhe karmon mein lagaana. Jo aisa karta hai use safalta aur shaanti prapt hoti hai.
author: Rigveda

quote: Khushi ka pehla roop uttam swasthya hai, vyakti ko shareer ko swasth rakhne ke liye paushtik, santulit aahar lena chahiye. Isliye mann aur shareer donon ke swasthya ko ek saath banaaye rakhna avashyak hai.
author: Rigveda

quote: Sachchi pooja sirf anushthaanik nahi hoti, balki hum us ishwar ke gunn apne jeevan mein utaarne ka prayaas karte hain jisaki hum aradhna karte hain.
author: Rigveda

quote: Jaise Surya oorja aur garmi pradaan karne ke liye aadar paata hai, usi prakaar aap bhi is duniya mein gyaan prapt karke sammaan pa sakte hain.
author: Rigveda

quote: Gyaan hi shakti hai.
author: Rigveda

quote: Jue mein na lage, apni zameen ki kheti karein. Usse milne waali aay ka aanand lein, aur us dhan ko paryaapt samjhein.
author: Rigveda

quote: Aarambh mein na astitva tha na anastitva, na aakaash tha na uske pare swarg... Vah Ek swas leta tha, bina swas ke, apni swas-rahit shakti se. Pehla janm thaa Rachnatmak Iccha ka, mann ka aadikal beej. Baaki sab uske piche aaya. Rishi, apne andar satya ki khoj karte hue, drishya aur adrishya ke beech shashvat bandhan ko khoj nikale. Yeh bandhan aakaash mein faila hua ek anant rekha thi. Kya tha oopar? Kya tha neeche? Aadi beej ankurit ho rahe the, virat shaktiyan gatimaaan thi; neche se khamaata, upar se shuddh oorja. Kaun jaanta hai? Kaun nishchit roop se keh sakta hai? Yeh srishti kab shuru hui aur kahaan se aayi? Devta baad mein aaye, isliye kaun sach mein jaanta hai? Is srishti kahaan se aayi, kis maadhyam se bani, kewal Vah jo sarvoch swarg se dekhta hai jaanta hai, ya shaayad Vah bhi nahi jaanta!
author: Rigveda

quote: Dharti shaant ho, vaayumandal shaant ho, aushadhiyan shaant hon, sabhi chamakne waale padarth shaant hon, sabhi gyaani purush shaant hon, sabhi karm shaant hon. In shaanti se hum yahaan jo bhayaanak hai, jo kroor hai, jo paap hai, uska shaman karein. Jo shaant ho gaya hai, vahi shubh hai. Sab hampe kripa karein.
author: Atharvaveda AV 19-9-14

quote: Hum sau sharad dekhen, hum sau sharad jiyein, hum sau sharad tak gyaan prapt karein, hum sau sharad tak nirantar aage badhte rahein, hum sau sharad samruddh rahein, hum sau sharad tak bane rahein, hum sau sharad tak shuddh rahein, aur humein sau sharad se bhi adhik samay tak rehne do.
author: Atharvaveda AV 19-67

quote: Hamare mata-pita (maata-pita) sukh se jiyein, gayon, manushyon aur saare sansar ka bhala ho, bahut saari shubh kismatein, gambheerta aur kripa hamesha hamare saath rahe aur hum bahut lambe samay tak surya ke prakash ka aanand lein.
author: Atharvaveda AV 1-31-4

quote: Sau bhagya manushya ke shareer ke janm ke saath janm lete hain (jinpe uska janm se adhikaar hai), unmein se hum un bhagyon ko door karte hain jo humein paap karmon ki or le jaate hain. Hey Ishwar, sampurna srishti ke gyaata, kripaya humein ve bhagya do jo hamare liye vardaan saabit ho.
author: Atharvaveda AV 7-115-3

quote: Yash aur keerti, shakti aur prabandhan kaushal, aadhyaatmik tej, poshan aur jeevika ke anya saadhan uski hai jo is Divyata ko Saral aur Ek ke roop mein janta hai.
author: Atharvaveda AV 13-4-14-5

quote: Vaani ki shakti mere mukh mein bani rahe, praan vayu hamesha mere nasikaon mein bana rahe, drashti ki shakti hamesha mere netron mein bani rahe, shravan shakti mere kaanon mein bani rahe, mere baal na safed hon, mere daant gande na hon aur meri bhujaaon mein bahut shakti ho.
author: Atharvaveda AV 19-60-1

quote: Mere jaanghon mein shakti ho, meri taangon mein tezi ho aur mere pairon mein dridhta ho; mere shareer ke sabhi ang swasth hon aur meri aatma hamesha satark rahe.
author: Atharvaveda AV 19-60-2

quote: Mere shareer ke sabhi ang achchhi sthiti mein rahein aur mujhmein sahansheelta ki shakti hamesha bani rahe. Mere dushmanon ke khilaf main apni poorn aayu prapt karoon. Main sabhi maamalon mein sukh aur poornata prapt karoon aur apne aap ko pavitra karke, main param aanand ki sthiti prapt karoon.
author: Atharvaveda AV 19-60-1

quote: Sabhi nakshatra, surya ke anupastith hone par uska prakaash ka strot, jo aakash mein hain, sabhi jo aakash mein hain, paani mein, dharti par, pahaadon par aur sabhi dishaon mein, aur sabhi kshetron mein jahaan chandrama jaata hai, wo sab humein sukh ka strot banen.
author: Atharvaveda AV 19-8-1

quote: O manav! Main tumhein apne hriday mein ekmatra, apne mann mein ekmatra aur nafrat se mukt rahne ka aadesh deta hoon. Tum ek doosre se pyaar karo jaise gai apne nave jaane wale bachche se pyaar karti hai.
author: Atharvaveda AV 3-30-1

quote: Beta apne pita ke prati aajnaakari ho aur maata ke mann ke anusaar ho. Patni apne pati se shaant, komal aur madhur shabdon mein baat kare jaise shahad.
author: Atharvaveda AV 3-30-2

quote: Bhai apne bhai se nafrat nahi karega aur behen apni behen ke prati kathor nahi hoga. Tum ek doosre se sabse adhik kripaya se baat karo aur apne mann ko ek rakho.
author: Atharvaveda AV 3-30-3

quote: Main tumhare ghar mein Veda ke us raaste ko aadesh deta hoon jiske khilaf gyaani log kabhi nahi jaate aur jo ek doosre ke prati nafrat nahi rakhte. Yeh sabhi manushyon ke liye margdarshak ho.
author: Atharvaveda AV 3-30-4

quote: O manav! Jo log vruddhon ke prati samman rakhte hain, jo shubh hriday wale hain, jo mitrata se apne karya mein lagte hain aur jo ek hi raaste par chalte hain, tum kabhi alag nahi ho. Aao, main tumhein ekmatra ichha aur ekmatra mann wala banata hoon aur tum ek doosre se madhur shabdon mein baat karo.
author: Atharvaveda AV 3-30-5

quote: Tumhare paani peene ka sthal ek ho aur tumhare bhojan ek saath ho. Main tumhein ek saath jodta hoon jaise rath ke nave ke aaspaas sabhi pahiyon ko joda jaata hai. Sabhi milkar Agni ka pooja karo jaise rath ke nave ke aaspaas pahiyon ko joda jaata hai.
author: Atharvaveda AV 3-30-6

quote: O manav! Main tumhein ek doosre ki madad karne, apne mann ko ek rakhne aur jeevan ka ek saamanya lakshya rakhne ka aadesh deta hoon. Jaise gyaani log amar siddhant ka palan karte hain, tumhare beech mitrata badhti rahe subah shaam.
author: Atharvaveda AV 3-30-7

quote: Mere hriday mein sthit ye paanch indriya aur mann jo chhatha hai, inhein prarthana ke madhyam se teek kar do. Jis se sabhi kathin karya kiye jaate hain, hum unse shanti prapt karein.
author: Atharvaveda AV 19-9-5

quote: O Prabhu! Mujhe gyaani logon ke beech pyaar ka vishay bana do aur duniya ke shasakon ke beech priya bana do. Mujhe sabhi logon ke beech pyara bana do jo mujhe dekhte hain, chahe wo koi mazdoor ho ya koi ucha adhikari.
author: Atharvaveda AV 19-62-1

quote: O Indra! Sarvochch shakti ka devta! Humen un cheezon se nirdar bana do jinke hum dar rahte hain.
author: Atharvaveda AV 19-15-1

quote: Vayumandala humein shanti aur suraksha de aur swarg aur prithvi dono humare liye surakshit rahein. Humen pashchim aur purva se koi khatra na ho aur uttar aur dakshin se bhi koi dar na ho.
author: Atharvaveda AV 19-15-5

quote: Hum apne mitron se bhi nirdar rahein aur apne shatruon se bhi. Humen jise jaante hain aur jise nahi jaante hain, unse kabhi bhi dar na ho. Hum raat aur din dono mein kisi bhi bhay se mukt rahein aur sabhi disha humare liye mitrata se bharpoor rahein.
author: Atharvaveda AV 19-15-6

quote: Main sarvochch Ishwar ko namaskar karta hoon jo bhoot, bhavishya aur agam ke sabhi ke niyamkarta hain aur jo shaashwat aanand ka roop hain.
author: Atharvaveda AV 10-8-1

quote: Wo sarv-srishti ka rachayita hai, niyamkarta hai, sabhi prakar ke gati aur urja ka strot hai aur sabki poshan karne wala hai.
author: Atharvaveda AV 13-4-3

quote: Use doosra, teesra, chautha, paanchva, chhatha, saatva, aathva, navva, dashva nahi kaha jaata. Wo ek aur ek hi hai.
author: Atharvaveda AV 13-4-16/18

quote: Wo sabhi jeevit aur nirjeevit ki dekhbhal karta hai. Uske paas sabhi vijay ka bal hai. Wo ek aur ek hi hai aur sabhi prakashit shaktiyan usmein ek ho jaati hain.
author: Atharvaveda AV 13-4-19/21

quote: Agar koi aadmi khada hota hai, chalta hai aur doosron ko chhupaata hai, chahe wo apne kamre mein ho ya khule mein, aur jo do log milkar chupke baat karte hain? Samraat Varuna sab kuch jaanta hai, unke beech teesra khada hota hai.
author: Atharvaveda AV 4/16/2

quote: Yeh dharti bhi Samraat Varuna aur teevr Soorya ka hissa hai, jo uske adhikaar mein sthit hai. Do samudra (dharti aur vaayumandaliya samudra) uske pet ke do gahre ghaat hain aur wo iske ek boond paani mein bhi vyapt hai.
author: Atharvaveda AV 4/16/3

quote: Agar koi aakash se pare bhaag jaaye, to bhi wo Samraat Varuna ki nigraani se bach nahi sakta. Kyunki uske hazaar aankhon wale prakashit shakti hamesha is dharti par nazar rakhti hain.
author: Atharvaveda AV 4/16/4

quote: Is dharti ko kaun ne banaya hai? Is aakash ko iske upar kaun ne rakha hai? Is vaayumandaliya vistar ko upar uthaya aur kaise phailaya gaya hai?
author: Atharvaveda AV 10-2-24

quote: Dharti ko Brahma – Sarvochch Astitva ne banaya hai aur Brahma ne hi aakash ko iske upar rakha hai. Brahma ne hi vaayumandaliya vistar ko upar uthaya aur phailaya hai.
author: Atharvaveda AV 10-2-25

quote: Sarvochch Astitva hamaare hriday ke sabse andar kamre mein prakat hota hai. Jo bhi gati karta hai ya nahi karta, sabhi jeev usmein poori tarah se sharan lete hain.
author: Atharvaveda AV 10-8-6

quote: Main us sarvavyapi taar ko jaanta hoon jismein sabhi jeev jude hain. Main us taar ka taar jaanta hoon, isliye main Sarvochch Ishwar ko jaanta hoon.
author: Atharvaveda AV 10-8-38

quote: Ishwar sabhi ka aadhar hai jo dharti aur aakash ko pakadta hai. Yeh aadhar vaayumandaliya vistar ko bhi pakadta hai aur yeh chhah dishaon ko bhi pakadta hai. Yeh aadhar poore brahmand mein vyapt hai.
author: Atharvaveda AV 10-7-35

quote: Jahaan dharti, vaayumandaliya vistar aur aakash basa hai, jahaan agni, chandrama, soorya aur vaayu sharan lete hain, wo kehte hain ki yeh aadhar hai; yeh sachmuch sabse adhik aanandmay astitva hai.
author: Atharvaveda AV 10-7-12

quote: O Apne Aap! Irsya ka pehla hamla aur uske baad jo bhi hota hai, yeh aag hai jo tumhare hriday mein bhar gayi hai (jo nitya dukh ka kaaran ban jaati hai). Main us aag ko poori tarah se tumhare hriday se door karta hoon.
author: Atharvaveda AV 6-18-1

quote: Jaise dharti jaagruk nahi hai, usse bhi zyada jaagruk nahi hai jo mrityu ko prapt ho chuka hai, usi tarah irsya se grast vyakti ka aantarik aatma bhi mrityu ko prapt ho jaata hai.
author: Atharvaveda AV 6-18-2

quote: O Apne Aap! Jo vichar tumhare hriday mein sthit hai, jo nichata tumhare hriday mein ghumti hai. Main us irsya ko door karta hoon jaise kisi bellow se garm hawa ko door kiya jaata hai.
author: Atharvaveda AV 6-18-3

quote: Aakash shanti se bharpoor ho, dharti ashtairya se mukt ho, vaayumandaliya vistar shaant ho, behte paani shantikarak ho. Sabhi paudhe aur aushadhi humare liye laabhdayak ho.
author: Atharvaveda AV 19-9-1

quote: Aane wale ghatnaon ke sabhi sanket ashtairya se mukt ho aur jo kiya gaya hai aur jo nahi kiya gaya hai, wo sabhi sukh ka strot banen. Bhoot aur bhavishya dono shanti se bharpoor ho aur sab hum par dayalu ho.
author: Atharvaveda AV 19-9-2

quote: Jo teevrata se bhara hai, pavitra hai, soorya ko vyapt karta hai aur prakriti ke niyamon dwara hum par aane wale dukh ko door karta hai. Wo ek hi Ishwar hai jo sabhi jeevon ka aadhar hai. Mitra devta hum par kripa karein.
author: Atharvaveda AV 2-2-2

quote: Adhik asahishnuta gyaan ki dushman hai; yeh humein turant nateeje par pahunchne, faisla karne aur dosh lagane ke liye prerit karti hai, samajhne ke bajaye.
author: Shri Ram

quote: Jab Tadaka ne Vishwamitra ke yagna mein badha daali, humne use rakshas kaha. Ab hum Indrajit ke pooja mein badha daalne ka yojna bana rahe hain. Kya hum bhi rakshas hain?
author: Shri Ram

quote: Ek gyaani vyakti ko durghatna ya durbhagya ka anuman lagakar usse bachne ya uska samadhan karne ke liye pehle se hi kadam uthana chahiye. Tabhi wo surakshit aur achchha jeevan jee sakta hai.
author: Shri Ram

quote: Chahe Ravana kitna bhi gyaani ho, chahe wo das-sir wala buddhimaan ho, agar wo dharma se vanchit hai, to uska vinash nishchit hai.
author: Shri Ram

quote: Jo log dharma ka gyaan rakhte hain, wo kehte hain ki satya sabse uchch dharma hai.
author: Shri Ram

quote: Kabhi apne virodhi ya shatru ko apne se chhota mat samjho. Jo Ravana ne aam bandar aur bhaluon ko samanya samjha tha, unhone uski puri sena ko nasht kar diya.
author: Shri Ram

quote: Adharm ka samarthan bhi vinash ka kaaran hota hai.
author: Shri Ram

quote: Jab ek vyakti ka vinash aata hai, tab uski buddhi bhrasht ho jaati hai.
author: Shri Ram

quote: Maata aur matrabhumi swarg se mahan hain!
